channel.title: Wayne County Office of Emergency Management | Facebook RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an RSS feed of the three most recent posts at https://www.facebook.com/WayneCoWVOEM/

item.title: Aug 29, 2024: Heat and humidity finish out the week with the
item.description: Aug 29, 2024: Heat and humidity finish out the week with the heat index reaching over 100ยบ across the lowlands today and Friday. - The mountains have the best chance for afternoon showers and storms. - Widespread showers and storms bring some relief this weekend before drier air arrives for Labor Day. @NWSCharlestonWV weather.gov/rlx/briefing #WVwx

item.title: DYK? More people die each year during heat waves than in all
item.description: DYK? More people die each year during heat waves than in all other disasters combined! Older adults are more at-risk during heat events, but there are steps everyone can take to save lives. Check out the graphic below. Learn more here: www.bt.cdc.gov/disasters/extremeheat/index.asp

item.title: A job well done in unpleasant conditions. Thank you to all w
item.description: A job well done in unpleasant conditions. Thank you to all who responded.
